text: Perla Liberatori (born November 10, 1981 in Rome) is an Italian voice actress. She voices characters in anime, cartoons and movies. Liberatori is well known for providing the voice of both Stella and Chatta in the fantasy animated series Winx Club.She also voices Celia Hills in the Italian language version Inazuma Eleven anime series. She is married to voice actor Gianluca Crisafi. Liberatori is also well known for dubbing over many actresses. ==Voice work== ===Anime and animation=== * Stella, Chatta, and Zing in Winx Club * Bubbles in The Powerpuff Girls * Bubbles in The Powerpuff Girls Movie * Bubbles in Powerpuff Girls Z * Sarah in Ed, Edd n Eddy and Ed, Edd n Eddy's Big Picture Show * Melody (speaking voice) in The Little Mermaid II: Return to the Sea * Andrina in The Little Mermaid: Ariel's Beginning * Senior Witch in Kiki's Delivery Service * Sophie Casterwill in Huntik: Secrets & Seekers * Jinx (1st voice) in Teen Titans * Yumi Yoshimura in Hi Hi Puffy AmiYumi * Iridessa in Tinker Bell * Iridessa in Tinker Bell and the Lost Treasure * Celia Hills in Inazuma Eleven * Milly Thompson in Trigun * Ferro in Gunslinger Girl * Karin Hanazono in Kamichama Karin * Kaname Chidori in Full Metal Panic! and Full Metal Panic? Fumoffu * Courtney Martin in Glenn Martin, DDS * Yuki Nagato in The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya * Nagisa Misumi/Cure Black in Pretty Cure * Nagisa Misumi/Cure Black in Futari wa Pretty Cure Max Heart * Nagisa Misumi/Cure Black in Futari wa Pretty Cure Max Heart: The Movie * Mindy in The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie * Morgan le Fay in Ah! My Goddess: The Movie ===Live action shows and movies=== * Lizzie McGuire in Lizzie McGuire and The Lizzie McGuire Movie * Olivia Kendall (2nd voice) in The Cosby Show * Griet in Girl with a Pearl Earring * Charisse Dolittle in Dr. Dolittle * Molly Pruitt in Home Alone 3 * Lindsay Gardner in The O.C. * Paris Geller (2nd voice) and Janet Billing in Gilmore Girls ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Child actors Category:Living people Category:Italian voice actors Category:1981 births
title: Perla Liberatori
